text: Colum Eastwood MP MLA (born 30 April 1983) is a Northern Irish politician. He has been the leader of the Social Democratic and Labour Party (SDLP) since 2015. He was elected to the Northern Ireland Assembly in 2011, and had since been re-elected. He quit in 2019. He was also the SDLP candidate in the 2019 European Parliament election to represent Northern Ireland. In December 2019 he was elected as Member of Parliament for Foyle. Eastwood was also mayor of Derry from 2010 to 2011. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:British mayors Category:Leaders of political parties in the United Kingdom Category:Social Democratic and Labour Party members of the Northern Ireland Assembly Category:UK MPs 2019â€“2024 Category:Social Democratic and Labour Party MPs Category:People from County Londonderry
title: Colum Eastwood
